title: Diamond Feather Haaram Pendant - TLC00139
materials: G-H color). Features Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: This pendant showcases a delicate feather-like design, paved with shimmering diamonds. Each diamond is meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize brilliance. The fan-like arrangement of the design provides an elegant and modern take on the traditional Haaram.
occasions: or as a statement piece for sophisticated evening events. Can be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits.
description: This pendant combines modern aesthetics with the timeless appeal of diamonds. The feather design symbolizes lightness, freedom, and elegance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine, making it a treasured piece for generations to come.
